name: Kobold Pit
description:
Kobolds are simple creatures. They like to sit in pits. They like to eat. They like to make giant skull piles. You are here to help them fulfill these dreams.

Kobold Pit is an affectionate parody of the Dwarf Fortress genre of games. It was made by David Stark while hung-over. He is sorry. If you want a more proper game, check out Airships.
